title: The Lawsuit That May Pave the Way for a Denver Broncos Sale
sub_head: A decision on the teamâ€™s future is expected soon. But first, the team went to court to settle an unexpected claim that someone holds rights of first refusal on a potential sale.
body:
An unexpected letter arrived last year at the offices of the Denver Broncos.
It came from a lawyer representing ROFR Holdings Ltd., an aptly named Canadian holding company that had a surprising claim concerning a potential sale of the Broncos.
